![ANNUAL NOTICE](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=30174)


Anyone who attends a Council Meeting / Work Session who requires use of the Phonic Ear Assistive Listening Device is asked to notify the Municipal Clerk's Office no later than 3PM on the day of the meeting.

The Municipal Council, as authorized by Chapter 4, Article 2:4-5 of the Revised Ordinances of the Township of Woodbridge shall constitute the authority to administer the issuance of licenses and to enforce state statutes and regulations and Local Ordinances relating to alcoholic beverage control. The Municipal Council shall have the authority to afford a hearing if and when there is a need for such action.
John M. Mitch, RMC / CMC / CMR
Municipal Clerk
